channel.title: People can only connect through client?
channel.description: I tried to do the tutorial, but for some reason it was already implemented into Ddsspeced v2, so I enabled the code. It didnt work at all, but when I changed the UID in the client.java on the server to >= 1, it worked. Anyone help? (Add my MSN if you cant speak here).

item.title: People can only connect through client?
item.dc:creator: @Thrasher_Alpha Thrasher Alpha
item.description:
@Thrasher_Alpha wrote:

I tried to do the tutorial, but for some reason it was already implemented into Ddsspeced v2, so I enabled the code. It didnt work at all, but when I changed the UID in the client.java on the server to >= 1, it worked. Anyone help? (Add my MSN if you cant speak here).

Read full topic
item.source: People can only connect through client?
